name: WatermelonStore
0:
”Alexa, ask watermelon store to get a watermelon”
”Alexa, ask watermelon store for a watermelon”
”Alexa, tell watermelon store it's watermelon time”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: watermelon store
des:
Have you ever had a sudden urge to have a watermelon, but you lacked the transportation and/or funds to get to an actual store to buy and eventually taste a watermelon?

You will never have this problem again! With the brand new Alexa Watermelon Store, you can experience the purchasing and consumption process of watermelons, all from the comfort of your home.

Simply ask the Watermelon Store for a watermelon, and you will receive a verbal watermelon! But what kind of watermelon did you get? Was it tasty? Delicious? Sweet? Or was it moldy? Alexa will answer that for you!

What are you waiting for? Go get some watermelon.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
